Title: Moone Boy
Actors: Chris O'Dowd, David Rawle, Aoife Duffin, Peter McDonald, Sarah White, Clare Monnelly, Deirdre O'Kane, Ian O'Reilly
Plot: Martin Moone is a young boy who relies on the help of his imaginary friend Sean to deal with the quandaries of life in a wacky small-town Irish family in the 1980's.
